Name: Questery
About the game: You woke up in a medieval castle. What happened? Why are you here? One thing you know for sure: you must get out of this place ASAP! Overcome cunning traps, find answers to challenging puzzles and start a war between the two kingdoms. This is the only way you can get the freedom you so desire! We are waiting for you at Questery! Features: You are in complete control of your character Move your arms and body to catch things! Interactive environment Many puzzles
